name: Otama
text: On Play: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal up to one green (Land of Wano) type card other than [Otama] and put it into your hand. Then, place the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal up to one green (Land of Wano) type card other than [Otama] and put it into your hand. Then, place the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.
